requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Supported OS: Microsoft Windows 2000/ Microsoft Windows XP (admin rights required). 95/98/ME/NT are no longer supported.
  • Processor: Pentium III @ 1GHz or Athlon XP equivalent
  • RAM: 256MB system memory
  • Graphics: 100% DirectX 9.0c 16MB Direct3D Card
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Hard Drive: 400MB free space, save games may require more space
  • Input Devices Keyboard and mouse
Recommended:
  • Supported OS: Microsoft Windows 2000/ Microsoft Windows XP (admin rights required), 95/98/ME/NT are no longer supported.
  • Processor: Pentium 4 @ 2GHz or Athlon XP/64bit equivalent
  • RAM: 512MB system memory

requirements_ru.minimum: Pentium III/Athlon 1 ГГц,256 Мб памяти,250 Мб на винчестере
requirements_ru.recommended: Pentium 4/Athlon XP 2 ГГц,512 Мб памяти,1 Гб на винчестере
